com.epam.training.dao

Class AbstractDAO<T extends Entity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.training.dao.AbstractDAO<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MySQLBuildDAO, MySQLFeatureDAO, MySQLIssueDAO, MySQLMemberDAO, MySQLProjectDAO

    public abstract class AbstractDAO<T extends Entity>
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class AbstractDAO is a generic class that contains methods allowing to operate with a database or data source (extract information, update or add data). The specific implementation of these methods depends on a type of database/data source used (e.g. MySQL database, XML, etc.).
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Vasili Andreev

      The constructor is used by sub-classes only

      abstract java.util.List<T> findAll()

      Returns an object of type T Entity (T can be a Member, Project, Issue, etc.) with the given ID.

      Updates the data of type T Entity object (T can be a Member, Project, Issue, etc.) in the database/data source.

    • Method Detail

      • findAll

        public abstract java.util.List<T> findAll()
                                                  throws DAOException
        Returns the list of type T Entity objects (T can be a Member, Project, Issue, etc.) available in the application. The information is extracted from a database/data source.
        Returns:
        The list of type T Entity objects (Members, Projects, Builds, etc.)
        Throws:
        DAOException - If a database access/handling error occurs.

      • findEntityByID

        public abstract T findEntityByID(int id)
                                         throws DAOException
        Returns an object of type T Entity (T can be a Member, Project, Issue, etc.) with the given ID. The information is extracted from a database/data source.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the Entity (Member, Project, Build, etc.)
        Returns:
        Type T Entity object (Member, Project, Build, etc.)
        Throws:
        DAOException - If a database access/handling error occurs.

      • addNewEntity

        public abstract boolean addNewEntity(T entity)
                              throws DAOException
        Adds new object of type T Entity (T can be a Member, Project, Issue, etc.) to the database/data source.
        Parameters:
        entity - new type T Entity object (Member, Project, Build, etc.)
        Returns:
        true if the object is successfully added and false otherwise
        Throws:
        DAOException - If a database access/handling error occurs.

      • updateEntity

        public abstract boolean updateEntity(T entity,
                   int id)
                              throws DAOException
        Updates the data of type T Entity object (T can be a Member, Project, Issue, etc.) in the database/data source.
        Parameters:
        entity - new type T Entity object (Member, Project, Build, etc.)
        id - the ID of type T Entity object to be updated
        Returns:
        true if the object's data is successfully updated and false otherwise
        Throws:
        DAOException - If a database access/handling error occurs.

      • close

        public void close(java.sql.Statement statement)
        Closes the opened statement.
        Parameters:
        statement - java.sql.Statement
        Throws:
        DAOException - If a there was an error while statement closing.
